verses.text_plain: At the end of every seven years thou shalt make a release.
verses.verse_html: 1At the end of every seven years thou shalt make a release.

verses.text_plain: And this is the manner of the release: Every creditor that lendeth ought unto his neighbour shall release it; he shall not exact it of his neighbour, or of his brother; because it is called the Lord’s release.
verses.verse_html:
2And this is the manner of the release: Every creditor that lendeth ought unto his neighbour shall release it; he shall not exact it of his neighbour, or of his brother; because it is called the Lord’s release. ▼
▼ creditor: Heb. master of the lending of his hand

footnotes.body_text: ▼ creditor: Heb. master of the lending of his hand
footnotes.body_html: ▼ creditor: Heb. master of the lending of his hand

verses.text_plain: Of a foreigner thou mayest exact it again: but that which is thine with thy brother thine hand shall release;
verses.verse_html: 3Of a foreigner thou mayest exact it again: but that which is thine with thy brother thine hand shall release;

tokens.text: which is thine with thy brother

verses.text_plain: Save when there shall be no poor among you; for the Lord shall greatly bless thee in the land which the Lord thy God giveth thee for an inheritance to possess it:
verses.verse_html:
4Save when there shall be no poor among you; for the Lord shall greatly bless thee in the land which the Lord thy God giveth thee for an inheritance to possess it: ▼
▼ Save…: or, To the end that there be no poor among you

tokens.text: when there shall be no poor

footnotes.body_text: ▼ Save…: or, To the end that there be no poor among you
footnotes.body_html: ▼ Save…: or, To the end that there be no poor among you

verses.text_plain: Only if thou carefully hearken unto the voice of the Lord thy God, to observe to do all these commandments which I command thee this day.
verses.verse_html: 5Only if thou carefully hearken unto the voice of the Lord thy God, to observe to do all these commandments which I command thee this day.

verses.text_plain: For the Lord thy God blesseth thee, as he promised thee: and thou shalt lend unto many nations, but thou shalt not borrow; and thou shalt reign over many nations, but they shall not reign over thee.
verses.verse_html: 6For the Lord thy God blesseth thee, as he promised thee: and thou shalt lend unto many nations, but thou shalt not borrow; and thou shalt reign over many nations, but they shall not reign over thee.

verses.text_plain: If there be among you a poor man of one of thy brethren within any of thy gates in thy land which the Lord thy God giveth thee, thou shalt not harden thine heart, nor shut thine hand from thy poor brother:
verses.verse_html: 7If there be among you a poor man of one of thy brethren within any of thy gates in thy land which the Lord thy God giveth thee, thou shalt not harden thine heart, nor shut thine hand from thy poor brother:

tokens.text: If there be among you a poor man

verses.text_plain: But thou shalt open thine hand wide unto him, and shalt surely lend him sufficient for his need, in that which he wanteth.
verses.verse_html: 8But thou shalt open thine hand wide unto him, and shalt surely lend him sufficient for his need, in that which he wanteth.

verses.text_plain: Beware that there be not a thought in thy wicked heart, saying, The seventh year, the year of release, is at hand; and thine eye be evil against thy poor brother, and thou givest him nought; and he cry unto the Lord against thee, and it be sin unto thee.
verses.verse_html:
9Beware that there be not a thought in thy wicked heart, saying, The seventh year, the year of release, is at hand; and thine eye be evil against thy poor brother, and thou givest him nought; and he cry unto the Lord against thee, and it be sin unto thee. ▼
▼ thought: Heb. word
 , ▼
▼ wicked: Heb. Belial

tokens.text: that there be not a thought
against thee, and it be sin

verses.text_plain: Thou shalt surely give him, and thine heart shall not be grieved when thou givest unto him: because that for this thing the Lord thy God shall bless thee in all thy works, and in all that thou puttest thine hand unto.
verses.verse_html: 10Thou shalt surely give him, and thine heart shall not be grieved when thou givest unto him: because that for this thing the Lord thy God shall bless thee in all thy works, and in all that thou puttest thine hand unto.

tokens.text: and in all that thou puttest

verses.text_plain: For the poor shall never cease out of the land: therefore I command thee, saying, Thou shalt open thine hand wide unto thy brother, to thy poor, and to thy needy, in thy land.
verses.verse_html: 11For the poor shall never cease out of the land: therefore I command thee, saying, Thou shalt open thine hand wide unto thy brother, to thy poor, and to thy needy, in thy land.

verses.text_plain: And if thy brother, an Hebrew man, or an Hebrew woman, be sold unto thee, and serve thee six years; then in the seventh year thou shalt let him go free from thee.
verses.verse_html: 12And if thy brother, an Hebrew man, or an Hebrew woman, be sold unto thee, and serve thee six years; then in the seventh year thou shalt let him go free from thee.

verses.text_plain: And when thou sendest him out free from thee, thou shalt not let him go away empty:
verses.verse_html: 13And when thou sendest him out free from thee, thou shalt not let him go away empty:

tokens.text: from thee, thou shalt not let him go away

verses.text_plain: Thou shalt furnish him liberally out of thy flock, and out of thy floor, and out of thy winepress: of that wherewith the Lord thy God hath blessed thee thou shalt give unto him.
verses.verse_html: 14Thou shalt furnish him liberally out of thy flock, and out of thy floor, and out of thy winepress: of that wherewith the Lord thy God hath blessed thee thou shalt give unto him.

verses.text_plain: And thou shalt remember that thou wast a bondman in the land of Egypt, and the Lord thy God redeemed thee: therefore I command thee this thing to day.
verses.verse_html: 15And thou shalt remember that thou wast a bondman in the land of Egypt, and the Lord thy God redeemed thee: therefore I command thee this thing to day.

verses.text_plain: And it shall be, if he say unto thee, I will not go away from thee; because he loveth thee and thine house, because he is well with thee;
verses.verse_html: 16And it shall be, if he say unto thee, I will not go away from thee; because he loveth thee and thine house, because he is well with thee;

tokens.text: And it shall be, if he say
unto thee, I will not go away

verses.text_plain: Then thou shalt take an aul, and thrust it through his ear unto the door, and he shall be thy servant for ever. And also unto thy maidservant thou shalt do likewise.
verses.verse_html: 17Then thou shalt take an aul, and thrust it through his ear unto the door, and he shall be thy servant for ever. And also unto thy maidservant thou shalt do likewise.

tokens.text: and he shall be thy servant

verses.text_plain: It shall not seem hard unto thee, when thou sendest him away free from thee; for he hath been worth a double hired servant to thee, in serving thee six years: and the Lord thy God shall bless thee in all that thou doest.
verses.verse_html: 18It shall not seem hard unto thee, when thou sendest him away free from thee; for he hath been worth a double hired servant to thee, in serving thee six years: and the Lord thy God shall bless thee in all that thou doest.

tokens.text: from thee; for he hath been worth
thee in all that thou doest

verses.text_plain: All the firstling males that come of thy herd and of thy flock thou shalt sanctify unto the Lord thy God: thou shalt do no work with the firstling of thy bullock, nor shear the firstling of thy sheep.
verses.verse_html: 19All the firstling males that come of thy herd and of thy flock thou shalt sanctify unto the Lord thy God: thou shalt do no work with the firstling of thy bullock, nor shear the firstling of thy sheep.

verses.text_plain: Thou shalt eat it before the Lord thy God year by year in the place which the Lord shall choose, thou and thy household.
verses.verse_html: 20Thou shalt eat it before the Lord thy God year by year in the place which the Lord shall choose, thou and thy household.

verses.text_plain: And if there be any blemish therein, as if it be lame, or blind, or have any ill blemish, thou shalt not sacrifice it unto the Lord thy God.
verses.verse_html: 21And if there be any blemish therein, as if it be lame, or blind, or have any ill blemish, thou shalt not sacrifice it unto the Lord thy God.

verses.text_plain: Thou shalt eat it within thy gates: the unclean and the clean person shall eat it alike, as the roebuck, and as the hart.
verses.verse_html: 22Thou shalt eat it within thy gates: the unclean and the clean person shall eat it alike, as the roebuck, and as the hart.

verses.text_plain: Only thou shalt not eat the blood thereof; thou shalt pour it upon the ground as water.
verses.verse_html: 23Only thou shalt not eat the blood thereof; thou shalt pour it upon the ground as water.
